Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • blobby.objects.GameObject
      • blobby.objects.Movable
        • blobby.objects.Ball
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Collidable

    public class Ball
extends Movable
implements Collidable
    Class representing a ball
